entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 30%
